name: Samsung Moment™
description: Feeling tied down? Break free from your PC with the Samsung Moment™. It features Google’s Android™ operating system and a full web browser so you can find what you need fast. You’ll enjoy downloadable apps galore for games, news & weather, shopping and social networks. And the brilliant 3.2” AMOLED display makes it easy to read emails, see content and watch videos. So stay in the moment and get ready for a high-speed Google search—right on your home screen.
additionalFeatures:
3G speeds where available 
Slide-out QWERTY keyboard 
Touchscreen 
Music capable 
Sprint TV® 
GPS Navigation enabled
